name: Reconciliation Engine • Collateral (Corporate Banking)
description: Reconciliation Engine • Collateral (Corporate Banking) screens statements and monitors SARs; applies decision gates and observability; orchestrates via SWIFT Gateway to reduce fraud loss.

steps.name: Case Intake
steps.description: Collect, validate and normalize customer profiles from Sanctions Lists; attach a runId and timestamp for traceability.

steps.name: Reason
steps.description: Execute reason phase for the Chain-of-Thought pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Decide
steps.description: Execute decide phase for the Chain-of-Thought pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Break Resolution
steps.description: Break Resolution across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Case Management
steps.description: Case Management across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Risk Scoring
steps.description: Risk Scoring across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Operations Handoff
steps.description: Assemble final payload with status, artifacts, KPIs and audit trail; store to SWIFT Gateway; return response JSON for the client.
